text: Tatoe ichibu no kuruān ga atte, sore ni yori yamayama ga idō sa re, daichi ga saka re, matawa shisha ni katara seru koto ga dekite mo, subete no meirei wa arrā ni zokusu nodearu. Arrā no okokoro ga areba, jinrui o isseini michibika reru koto o, shinkō suru mono-tachi wa imadani nattoku shite inai no ka. Daga fushin-sha-tachi wa kare-ra no (warui) okonai no tame ni, arrā no yakusoku ga jitsugen suru made saiyaku ga kare-ra no sumai to sono fukin ni taeru koto naku tsukimatō. Hontōni arrā wa kesshite yakusoku o tagae rarenai
